overview: Smokin' hot, tatted Gia DiMarco looks good enough to eat. Enter Small Hands, who's got a hunger for the sweet treats that Gia has to offer. The voluptuous Dylan Phoenix is in bed showing off her freshly shaved head, pierced nipples and massive titties. Tommy Pistol bounces into the room, asking Dylan if she wants some cotton candy. Gorgeous Joanna Angel is feeling festive and wants to celebrate the holidays by getting her stocking stuffed. Rob Piper's more than ready to deliver the Christmas cheer that Joanna's been craving. The gorgeous Lena Moon shows off her immaculately tattooed body. It doesn't take long for her to grab the attention of Pierce Paris.
title: Tatted Tail
